subtitle: I think we need to constantly reevaluate
what we believe and particularly if we
believe things that don't nourish us I
think why do I believe that where did I
learn that does is that really true for
me now does it make sense maybe I could
let that one go
we are the only thinkers in our mind
when we create peace and Harmony and
balance in our minds we will find it in
our lives which of these statements
sound like you people are out to get me
or Everyone is always helpful each one
of these beliefs will create quite
different experiences what we believe
about ourselves and about life becomes
true for us the universe totally
supports Us in every thought we choose
to think and believe put another way our
subconscious mind accepts whatever we
choose to believe what I believe about
myself and about life becomes true for
me what you choose to think about
yourself and about life becomes true for
you and we have unlimited choices about
what we can think when we know this then
it makes sense to choose Everyone is
always helpful rather than people are
out to get me the Universal Power never
judges or criticizes us it only only
accepts us at our own value then it
reflects our beliefs in our lives if I
want to believe that life is lonely and
that nobody loves me then that is what I
will find in my world however if I am
willing to release that belief and to
affirm for myself that love is
everywhere and I am loving and lovable
and to hold on to that new affirmation
and to repeat it often then it will
become true for me now loving people
will come into my life the people
already in my life will be more loving
to me and I will find myself easily
expressing love to others most of us
have foolish ideas about who we are and
many many rigid rules about how life
should be lived this is not to condemn
us for each of us is doing the very best
we can at this very moment if we knew
better if we had more understanding and
awareness then we would do it
differently please don't put yourself
down for being where you are the very
fact that you have found this tape and
have discovered me means that you are
ready to make a new and positive change
in your life you never do anything right
it's all your fault how often have you
said this to yourself you are wonderful
I love you how often do you tell
yourself this however I would not blame
our parents we are all victims of
victims and they could not possibly have
taught us anything they did not know if
your mother did not know how to love
herself or your father did not know how
to love himself then it would be
impossible for them to Teach You To Love
Yourself they were doing the best they
could with what they had been taught as
children if you want to understand your
parents more get them to talk about
their own childhood and if you listen
with compassion you will learn where
their fears and rigid patterns came from
those people who did all that stuff to
you were just as frightened and scared
as you are I believe believe we choose
our parents each one of us decides to
Incarnate upon this planet at particular
points in time and space we have chosen
to come here to learn a particular
lesson that will advance us upon our
spiritual evolutionary pathway we choose
our sex our color our country and then
we look around for the particular set of
parents who will mirror the pattern we
are bringing in to work on in this
lifetime it is important that we fulfill
our creative side in a positive way
because if we don't we will fulfill it
in a negative way that creativity must
be expressed and you will express it in
a negative way by your thinking some of
you I know I used to get very creative
with my negative thinking Vengeance and
all those wonderful things that only
come back to us and create problems so
allow the positive create native side of
yourself to come out make joy and
happiness the very center of your world
you know it's not out there it's in here
and we can find joy and happiness in
every area of our life if we look for it
life is very funny really very funny I
think it's vital that we develop a
strong spiritual connection with life
and sometimes we do that through
religion and sometimes we do that as a
solitary journey of going within and
meditating and allowing answers to come
through us but it is vital I'm not a
religious person but I am a deeply
spiritual person and I feel very very
connected with all of life I think it is
vital that we have integrity that we can
keep our word that if we promise
somebody something we honor it and
follow through if you promise yourself
something honor it and follow through we
must have self-respect and you cannot
have self-respect if you break your
promises to yourself I never make a
promise anymore that I know I will not
that I do not want to keep because when
I make a promise I keep it so many of us
you know promise ourselves things and
then we fall through on them and if you
can't honor and respect yourself you
can't trust yourself you will never
trust life that we need to develop that
and then the other thing is to live from
a center of gratitude it makes a
tremendous difference in life when I
awaken in the morning before I even open
my eyes I thank the bed for a good
night's sleep and for me keeping me so
comfortable all night and then I thank
life for myself that I'm here that I've
chosen to live another day that I get to
spend another day with me I'm grateful
for my family and for my friends from my
home for my animals I have four
wonderful dogs for the vegetables that I
grow for the work that I do for the
experiences I will have that day for the
health of my body and I go on and on and
on and this is before I open my eyes so
that when I begin my day it is coming
from a place of gratitude and life Loves
A Grateful person and you get much more
to be grateful about gratitude brings
you the goodies and when I say the
goodies I don't mean just things I mean
the people and the places and the
experiences that mean so much in life be
thankful for all that we have so that
stop all criticism don't scare yourself
be committed to the relationship you
have with yourself treat yourself as
though you are loved take care of your
body educate yourself keep learning
build a financial future for yourself
can't expect them to take care of us
fulfill your creative side make joy and
happiness the center of your world and
develop a strong spiritual connection
with life have integrity keep your word
respect yourself and live from a center
of gratitude
